main event: Observation of 6 lights moving in a straight line for about 3 seconds in Albuquerque, New Mexico on 22 November 1965.
interesting points: The lights were observed at night under somewhat overcast conditions,The observation lasted for only 3 seconds,The report concludes that the lights were likely aircraft,Two commercial aircraft took off around the same time in the vicinity,The witnesses were described as sincere adults including a wife and in-laws.
sighted object: six lights in a straight line
witness description: a wife, father-in-law, and mother-in-law, all adults
